___url.description: URL to the image. The image should be in a suitable resolution for display on the page.

___high_resolution_url.description: URL to a high resolution version of the image, for use by third parties such as Twitter, Facebook or Slack. Used by the machine readable metadata component. Don't use this on user-facing web pages, as it might be very large.

___high_resolution_url.description: URL to a high resolution version of the image, for use by third parties such as Twitter, Facebook or Slack. Used by the machine readable metadata component. Don't use this on user-facing web pages, as it might be very large.

_88analytics_identifier.description: A short identifier we send to Google Analytics for multi-valued fields. This means we avoid the truncated values we would get if we sent the path or slug of eg organisations.

_88absolute_path.description: A path only. Query string and/or fragment are not allowed.
